sentences.english: You can separate the stamps along the perforated line.
sentences.chinese: 你可以順着齒孔線把郵票撕開。

sentences.english: Grooves extend to the finished edge, but rear perforations are not visible.
sentences.chinese: 凹槽延伸到成品的優勢，但後排齒孔中不可見。

sentences.english: A second new application was setting MC across producing perforations for a temporary abandonment plug.
sentences.chinese: 第二個新申請設置管委會橫跨產齒孔爲暫時放棄堵塞。

sentences.english: The rear perforations are visible on the cut edge.
sentences.chinese: 後方齒孔都是看得見，對切緣。
